record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1922. Fifth row: H. O. Crisler, N. H. Norgren, A. A. Stagg (coach), Dr. C. O. Molander, and N. B. Johnson; fourth row: C. Dickson, F. K. Gowdy, R. W. King, W. L. Zorn, and J. Pondelik; third row: O. E. Strohmeier, W. A. Dawson, J. W. Thomas, H. A. Fletcher, E. A. Lampe, and R. L. Miller; second row: L. L. McMasters, H. W. Lewis (captain), and J. M. Pyott; first row: H. L. Thomas, A. W. Proudfoot, H. T. Byler, R. M. Leggette, and L. E. Rohrke.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
